name: void Connect()
description:
A very short puzzle game entry for Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM, where you have to connect waypoints to your next destination, heavily inspired by CrossCode's dungeon puzzles.

Controls:
    Move - WASD
    Aim - RMB
    Shoot - LMB (while aiming)
    Charge bounce shot - Hold LMB (no indicator, just wait about half a second)
    Change projectile type - MMB

Beautiful music by Alex Smith licensed under CC0

Sound effects by rubberduck licensed under CC0
